types.html:
malgré-nous m (plural malgré-nous)

  1. someone forced into military service
  2. (historical) Soldiers from Alsace and Lorraine forced into German military service during WWI and WWII
trans: Soldiers from Alsace and Lorraine forced into German military service during WWI and WWII
Soldiers from Alsace and Lorraine forced into German military service during WWI and WWII

title: malgré-nous
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /mal.ɡʁe.nu/
